<title level="1" pfs="">[Yarrika](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1488)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 44

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Yarrika](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1488)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 34</row>

**Perception** +27

**Languages**
[Arcadian](/Languages.aspx?ID=88), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +24, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_, _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 37 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 250

**Mantis Ambush** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within Yarrika's reach is hit by an ally's melee attack; **Effect** Yarrika makes a mantis strike against the triggering creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_fist_ +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 3d4+10 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_mantis strike_ +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Twin](/Traits.aspx?ID=197), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 3d12+10 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 36
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Summon Fey](/Spells.aspx?ID=322), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Circle of Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=38), [Invisibility Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=165), [Nondetection](/Spells.aspx?ID=209) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [Telepathy](/Spells.aspx?ID=337) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Banishment](/Spells.aspx?ID=19), [Shadow Siphon](/Spells.aspx?ID=274), [Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=327) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43), [Spellwrack](/Spells.aspx?ID=298), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (3 slots)
- **7th**
[Dimensional Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=71), [Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [Energy Aegis](/Spells.aspx?ID=100) (3 slots)
- **8th**
[Scintillating Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=267), [Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=347) (2 slots)

**Occult Strike** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Trigger** Yarrika casts an occult spell; **Effect** Yarrika makes a fist Strike against a creature within reach.

</column>
name: Yarrika
